T02D1263:12a-5: bde gshegs rnams kyis bde sogs mdzad //
T02D1263:12a-6: byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi //
T02D1263:12a-7: yang dag don mchog rnam par dag / ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yis //
T02D1263:12a-8: mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin //
T02D1263:12a-9: de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi //
T02D1263:12a-10: sdug bsngal rnams ni bsal bar mdzod //
T02D1263:12a-11: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog / rab rib nyes pa'i dri ma 'joms //
T02D1263:12a-12: gang ni byang chub bla med pa //
T02D1263:12a-13: de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod //
T02D1263:12a-14: ces brjod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1263:12a-15: de nas bla mas shes rab ma bdag med mar bskyed la /
T02D1263:12a-16: de la go cha dang bya ba dang /
T02D1263:12a-17: gnas gsum du yang lha gsum bskyed la /
T02D1263:12a-18: ye shes sems dpa' bkug pa dang /
T02D1263:12a-21: rjes su dgyes pa byas te bstims la /
T02D1263:12a-22: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan te /
T02D1263:12a-24: mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1263:12a-25: aom padma su kha dh'a ra ma h'a r'a ga
T02D1263:12a-26: su kham da da tsa tur a'a na n+dya bha
T02D1263:12a-27: ga bi shva h'um h'um h'um ka ryam ku ru
T02D1263:12a-28: shva me / aom badzra ma h'a da sha tsa
T02D1263:12a-29: tu ra a'a nanda da ma ka kha ga mu
T02D1263:12a-30: khe ka r'a sho n'a tha h'um h'um h'um karyam
T02D1263:12a-33: nyes pa med de rnam par dag par bsam mo //
T02D1263:12a-34: de nas snyoms par 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1263:12a-35: mi bskyod pa mdzad cing rang gi ye shes sems
T02D1263:12a-36: dpa'i thugs ka'i mtshan ma'i lte ba'i h'um las 'od
T02D1263:12a-37: 'phros pas phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams spyan drangs nas
T02D1263:12a-38: / thugs kar thim pa la sogs pa rnams byas nas /
T02D1263:12a-39: byang chub kyi sems 'bar ba bo la'i sker phyin pa dang /
T02D1263:12a-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1263:12a-42: chags pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin no bar nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1263:12a-43: de nas byang chub kyi sems bo la'i skyer mtheb srin gyis mnan la /
T02D1263:12a-44: slob ma'i bu gar 'dren par bya'o //
T02D1263:12a-45: de nas slob dpon gyis au pa su mandra blta bar byos /
T02D1263:12a-46: aa ho su kha zhes brjod /
T02D1263:12a-47: slob mas bde ba can chen po'i dpal he ru ka bdag nyid do zhes brjod /
T02D1263:12a-48: bskur te 'thung ba'i rting la brjod /
T02D1263:12b-0: de'i rdo rje'i @12b dpal gyis reg pa des ni ngag gi nyes pa dang /
T02D1263:12b-1: rnam par rtog pa thams cad sel bar byed pas na /
T02D1263:12b-3: de nas 'bras bu gang dang gang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1263:12b-4: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1263:12b-5: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam par de la lung bstan par bya ste /
T02D1263:12b-6: bla mas chos gos gyon la lag pa g-yon pas
T02D1263:12b-7: chos gos kyi tha ma chang par bcug la 'di
T02D1263:12b-8: skad brjod do // 'di ltar ngas yongs su bstan te /
T02D1263:12b-9: he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1263:12b-10: dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02D1263:12b-11: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02D1263:12b-12: shr'i he ru ka na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta hi /
T02D1263:12b-13: siddha sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva: zhes brjod do //
T02D1263:12b-14: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa dang //
T02D1263:12b-15: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu lung ston par mdzad do //
T02D1263:12b-17: khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa dang /
T02D1263:12b-18: rgyal ba rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa dang /
T02D1263:12b-19: phyin ci log gi bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa las rgyal ba dang /
T02D1263:12b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer dam par 'jug pa ste /
T02D1263:12b-21: 'di nyid kyis sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur gyis /
T02D1263:12b-22: the tshom dang yid gnyis la sogs pa ma byed
T02D1263:12b-23: cig / gzhan yang bla ma dam pas dbang bskur
T02D1263:12b-24: ba tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa ltar slob ma
T02D1263:12b-28: // / de nas shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02D1263:12b-31: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1263:12b-32: de la shes rab kyi dbang ni gzhon nu ma
T02D1263:12b-33: lo grangs gong ma dang mthun pa bla ma la
T02D1263:12b-34: phul la / mandala chag chag la sogs pa gong ma dang mthun par bya'o //
T02D1263:12b-35: de nas bla mas shes rab ma byin gyis brlab pa sngon dang mthun par byas la /
T02D1263:12b-36: bla mas shes rab ma dang slob ma la bsgo ba bya ste /
T02D1263:12b-37: khyod kyis 'dod chags kyang spang du mi rung ste /
T02D1263:12b-38: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang /
T02D1263:13a-0: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad pa las ye shes @13a * //
T02D1263:13a-2: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste /
T02D1263:13a-3: khyod kyis kyang 'dod chags spang du mi rung ste /
T02D1263:13a-4: gnyis su med pa'i rol pa gyis shig / ye shes skye bar 'gyur gyis zhes brjod de bsgo'o //
T02D1263:13a-5: bla mas yang 'di skad brjod de /
T02D1263:13a-6: khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can //
T02D1263:13a-7: dri chen dri chu bza' btung yin //
T02D1263:13a-8: rakta ga pur ma sha dang //
T02D1263:13a-9: bud med mos pas dang nus sam //
T02D1263:13a-10: bha gar 'o byed mi rtog gam //
T02D1263:13a-11: spros shing rdo rje bde ba can //
T02D1263:13a-12: de nas yang slob ma dang shes rab gnyis kyis /
T02D1263:13a-14: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi theg dri chen sa bon sogs za zhing //
T02D1263:13a-15: shes rab yang dag dad par bgyis //
T02D1263:13a-16: bha ga la yang 'o bgyid do //
T02D1263:13a-18: de nas shes rab gcer bur phyung la /
T02D1263:13a-19: khrus byas la dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02D1263:13a-20: me tog gi phreng ba mgo la bcings nas /
T02D1263:13a-21: lag pa gnyis kyis grva gnyis nas gzung ste /
T02D1263:13a-22: kha phye la shes rab mas 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1263:13a-23: rmad chen nga yi padma yin //
T02D1263:13a-24: bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02D1263:13a-25: rtag tu rim bzhin 'di la spyod //
T02D1263:13a-27: chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag / sems can khams ni rnam par grol //
T02D1263:13a-29: rang bzhin thams cad 'di la gnas //
T02D1263:13a-30: nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02D1263:13a-31: padma la zhugs rab tu gsungs //
T02D1263:13a-32: bha ga'i nang du nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1263:13a-33: 'byung ba lnga po rgyan bzhin chongs //
T02D1263:13a-34: lte ba la ni ge sar bcas //
T02D1263:13a-35: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1263:13a-36: de yi dbus nas 'byung ba yin //
T02D1263:13a-37: de nyid bdud rtsi shu kra gzugs //
T02D1263:13a-38: bha nydza mo ksha ho zhes shes rab mas brjod do //
T02D1263:13a-39: de nas bla mas shi shya'i lag pa dang /
T02D1263:13a-40: shes rab ma'i lag pa gnyis steng 'og tu bzhag la /
T02D1263:13a-41: shes rab ma 'dis khyod kyi ye shes skyed par byed pa yin pas /
T02D1263:13a-42: 'di dang khyod rtag tu mi 'bral bar 'grogs shig ces brjod pa de kho na /
T02D1263:13a-43: shes rab kyi dbang yin no /
T02D1263:13a-45: // / de nas shi shya shes rab ma dang gnyis yol ba'i nang du 'dug la /
T02D1263:13a-46: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang slob mas nod par bya'o //
T02D1263:13b-0: de nas shes rab de la shi shyas glo @13b g-yon pas la phab nas nyal la /
T02D1263:13b-2: gnas dgur sen mos gdab par bya ste /
T02D1263:13b-3: g-yon pa'i lag pa g-yon pa'i 'og tu 'dug pas
T02D1263:13b-4: padma'i nang gi bye'u mgo 'dra ba la glang po
T02D1263:13b-5: che'i lag pas brud pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1263:13b-6: de nas lces kyang rol mo yang yang du byas la /
T02D1263:13b-8: de nas shes rab ma dang gnyis sbyor ba byas te /
T02D1263:13b-9: dal bu dal bus bskyod pa la /
T02D1263:13b-10: byang chub kyi sems bo la'i sker phyin pa las /
T02D1263:13b-11: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes te /
T02D1263:13b-12: ji tsam gnas kyi bar du bsgom mo //
T02D1263:13b-13: de nas ma thub na kakkolar phyung la /
T02D1263:13b-14: de nyid kye'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin pas lces blang ngo //
T02D1263:13b-16: lag pas blang bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1263:13b-17: nya phyis kyis kyang mi bya ste //
T02D1263:13b-18: dung la'ang gzhag par mi bya'o //
T02D1263:13b-19: bdud rtsi lce yis blang bar bya //
T02D1263:13b-21: ka sko la nas lce kho nas blang bar bya'o //
T02D1263:13b-22: de ni shes rab ma'i kakkola nas ye shes kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems blangs te /
T02D1263:13b-23: zos pas na shes rab dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D1263:13b-24: de la dga' ba rnam pa bzhi ni dga' ba dang /
T02D1263:13b-25: yang dag pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1263:13b-26: rang bzhin gyis dga' ba dang /
T02D1263:13b-27: chad pa'i dga' ba dang bzhi'o //
T02D1263:13b-28: de la dga' ba ni 'ba' rtsa bya ba nas /
T02D1263:13b-29: bo la'i rtsar phyin gyi bar du'o //
T02D1263:13b-30: yang dag pa'i dga' ba ni /
T02D1263:13b-31: dkyil du phyin pa tsam mo //
T02D1263:13b-32: rang bzhin gyi dga' ba ni bo la'i sker phyin pa la bya ste /
T02D1263:13b-33: de ni mi rtog pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D1263:13b-34: 'on te gang du dgos pa yin zhe na /
T02D1263:13b-36: 'khor lo bzhi'i rang bzhin dang mnyam par byed do //
T02D1263:13b-37: 'o na 'khor lo bzhi dang dga' bzhir ji ltar sbyar ba ni gsum las med de /
T02D1263:13b-38: chad pa'i dga' ba ni grangs su mi 'gro zhes so //
T02D1263:13b-39: smras pa chad pa'i dga' ba grangs su 'gro //
T02D1263:13b-40: ci'i phyir dga' ba chen po med kyang /
T02D1263:13b-41: skad cig ma'i dga' ba grangs yod pas mi 'gal /
T02D1263:13b-42: rgyud las kyang dga' ba bstan pas 'khor lo bzhi
T02D1263:13b-43: dang sbyar ba mi 'gal lo zhes bya ba la
T02D1263:13b-44: sogs pa nas ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba yin
T02D1263:13b-45: no // des ni yid nyes pa thams cad dag par byed pa thugs kyi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D1263:13b-46: de la 'bras bu gang dang gang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1263:14a-0: @14a * // rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang 'di lta bu'i dbang thob
T02D1263:14a-1: pa'i rnal 'byor pa skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro
T02D1263:14a-2: // de nas de'i tshe dam tshig rnams yang dag par dbog par bya'o //
T02D1263:14a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1263:14a-6: de nas gser dang dngul dang /
T02D1263:14a-7: nor bu rin po che dang /
T02D1263:14a-13: shing rta nor dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1263:14a-14: yid la gces pa yon gyi mchog rnams bla ma la /
T02D1263:14a-15: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal dbul lo //
T02D1263:14a-16: 'di nas brtsams te bla ma'i zhabs kyi bran du bdag mchi'o //
T02D1263:14a-17: bdag gi lus kyang bzhes su gsol zhes brjod do //
T02D1263:14a-18: slob dpon gyis kyang rang gi slob ma byang chub tu bsgrubs la dga' ba'i phyir /
T02D1263:14a-19: mos pa dang 'byor pa che'o zhes gtam bya'o //
T02D1263:14a-20: dad mos che ba'i slob ma yis //
T02D1263:14a-21: dang po yon ni dbul bar bya //
T02D1263:14a-22: dad mos med pa'i slob ma yis //
T02D1263:14a-23: dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1263:14a-24: slob dpon gyi yon dbul ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1263:14a-25: de nas dkyil 'khor la glu dang gar la sogs pa dang /
T02D1263:14a-26: rol mo'i cha byad mang po thogs la bskor ba lan gsum bya /
T02D1263:14a-28: phyogs skyong la gtor ma gtang /
T02D1263:14a-30: de nas tshon la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams la /
T02D1263:14a-31: nang par tho rangs bsdu bar bya /
T02D1263:14a-32: bsdus nas gser gyi bum par blugs la /
T02D1263:14a-33: chu chen por bor bar bya /
T02D1263:14a-34: bum pa thams cad kyang chu chen por bskyal /
T02D1263:14a-36: sngon bzhin du ga na tsa kra'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor /
T02D1263:14a-37: glu gar gyi rnam pa brjod /
T02D1263:14a-38: de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D1263:14a-41: ba'i lci ba rnams sbyar la /
T02D1263:14a-42: sa la byugs pa byas nas tshon dang thig mi mngon par bya'o //
T02D1263:14a-43: bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rim pa /
T02D1263:14a-44: cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa ma nor ba rdzogs so /
T02D1263:14a-46: // / slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1263:14a-48: // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang /
